com.github.fge.msgsimple.bundle

Class MessageBundleBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.fge.msgsimple.bundle.MessageBundleBuilder
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.github.fge.Thawed<MessageBundle>

    public final class MessageBundleBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.github.fge.Thawed<MessageBundle>
    Builder class for a message bundle

    You cannot instantiate this class directly: use MessageBundle.newBuilder().

    This class is the Thawed counterpart of a MessageBundle.

    See Also:
    MessageBundle
